ALL SOLD!: I bought a bunch of really nice raw T205s at the National, and got home and realized I had some of them already (I was working off an old list ..... sigh).  My screw-up is your chance to pick up some cool cards at good prices. Add $5 for shipping regardless of number of cards purchased. Paypal preferred. DM if you want to discuss further.

Stone Piedmont 
Snodgrass Piedmont 
Smith Polar Bear 
Simmons Piedmont 
Murray Piedmont 
Tannehill Piedmont 
Dickson Sweet Cap
Paskert Sweet Cap
Sheckard Piedmont 
ALL SOLD
Dang! Set builders don’t have a chance. These go instantly
